markdown:
**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 1.1 --- You have a habit of always being in the way when other creatures attempt to move. Attempt an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) check against an adjacent creature's Reflex DC. **Critical Success** The target creature gains a –2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves and is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) until the start of your next turn.
**Success** The target creature gains a –2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves until the start of your next turn.
name: Catfolk Dance

Critical Success The target creature gains a –2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves and is off-guard until the start of your next turn.
